plugins.microphonePermission: Cue Wellness needs access to your microphone so you can record reflections and voice notes during your wellness journey.

plugins.cameraPermission: Cue Wellness needs access to your camera so you can capture certificates, profile picture and track your wellness progress with photos.

infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Cue Wellness needs access to your microphone so you can record reflections and voice notes during your wellness journey.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Cue Wellness needs access to your photo library so you can upload certificates, profile picture and progress photos.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Cue Wellness needs access to your camera so you can capture certificates, profile picture and track your wellness progress with photos.
